1151790.name: AppGameKit Studio Demo
1151790.description:
AppGameKit FREE Trial

Get a true feel for AppGameKit Studio with this free trial version
This 14 day Free Trial version of AppGameKit Studio lets you code and compile projects and even save them.
You can try out the cool features of AppGameKit Studio such as the scene editor, the media browser and the debugger – all for FREE
New users will be able to get a good feel for how AppGameKit Studio works and the benefits it brings over the older ‘Classic’ version
Restrictions:
  • 14 day usage
  • AppGameKit logo watermark
  • Broadcast feature disabled
  • Export feature disabled
  • Trial is only available on Windows
